title: Kings of the East quartefinals coming
body:
Hello forum!

We are starting finals now and I want to remind everyone that there's a tournament featuring best challenger EUNE teams. These teams may win LCS spot next split.

Moving to some basic infos. Prize pool is 1500$ sponsored by hitbox.tv. We are currently starting quarterfinals featuring teams such as Different Dimension, Tricked eSports and Team ROCK. It will be streamed in both Polish ([hitbox.tv/gromptv](http://www.hitbox.tv/gromptv)) and English ([hitbox.tv/grompen](http://www.hitbox.tv/grompen)). We will broadcast matches on Saturday and Sunday, from 16:00 to 22:00 CET.

TL;DR Best EUNE teams playing for 1500$, Saturday and Sunday, 16:00-22:00 CET, [hitbox.tv/grompen](http://www.hitbox.tv/grompen)

PS We also have a fancy promotional video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8p0oF3sz9GY

replies.body: It's the **Hungarian** subforum.. Probably you want to post this [here](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/).
